sn44.4:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye …pe…
sn44.4:1.3: “Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetaṁ abyākataṁ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.4:1.4: “Rūpaṁ kho, āvuso, ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṁ, rūpasamudayaṁ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṁ, rūpanirodhaṁ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṁ, rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṁ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:1.6: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:1.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.4:1.11: viññāṇaṁ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṁ, viññāṇasamudayaṁ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṁ, viññāṇanirodhaṁ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṁ, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṁ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:1.13: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:1.14: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”tipissa hoti.
sn44.4:2.1: Rūpañca kho, āvuso, jānato passato yathābhūtaṁ, rūpasamudayaṁ jānato passato yathābhūtaṁ, rūpanirodhaṁ jānato passato yathābhūtaṁ, rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ jānato passato yathābhūtaṁ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.4:2.2: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.4:2.6: viññāṇaṁ jānato passato yathābhūtaṁ, viññāṇasamudayaṁ jānato passato yathābhūtaṁ, viññāṇanirodhaṁ jānato passato yathābhūtaṁ, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ jānato passato yathābhūtaṁ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
sn44.4:2.7: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
sn44.4:2.8: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
sn44.4:2.9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.4:2.10: Ayaṁ kho, āvuso, hetu ayaṁ paccayo, yenetaṁ abyākataṁ bhagavatā”ti.
